identity.name: Foodambo
identity.core_philosophy: Digital Ghar Ka Khana - Technology that feels like a warm hug, not a cold machine.

rules: Use Manrope for all headings to give a friendly, modern look.
Use Inter for body text for maximum legibility.
Use Caveat Brush sparingly for 'Handmade' tags or 'Chef's Note' to add a human touch.
Headings must never be pure black (#000000). Use #2D2D2D.

primary.description: Terracotta Red - Warm, appetizing, urgent but not alarming.

background.description: Warm Cream / Rice Paper - Avoid sterile white.

cards.style: bg-white border border-border/40 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

navigation.mobile_bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-border/40 z-50 h-16 flex items-center justify-around

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture (opacity 0.02) on the main background to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] for cards. Use colored shadows for primary buttons.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 for sticky headers and overlays.

general: Implement the 'Earthy Spice' theme immediately in tailwind.config.js.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. DO NOT use random Lorem Ipsum images.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Prioritize mobile responsiveness. This is a PWA.
Use Shadcn components but override the default 'zinc' styling with our warm palette.

specific_pages.home: Create a 'Bento' grid for categories. Use horizontal scrolling for 'Trending Dishes'.
specific_pages.product_detail: Use a large hero image (aspect-square on mobile). Add a 'Chat with Seller' floating action button.
specific_pages.seller_profile: Focus on trust. Show FSSAI badge prominently. Use the 'chef_woman' image as a placeholder for the seller avatar.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
